Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to prohibiting the transloading of certain wastes at facilities in Richmond county
Summary: Prohibits the transloading of municipal solid waste, toxic waste or hazardous waste at facilities in Richmond county unless such waste originates in such county except after an environmental impact study and a public hearing.
LawSection: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 631 of the laws of 1947, facilitating the development by the Port of New York Authority of marine terminals, in relation to prohibiting transloading of certain waste at facilities in Richmond county
